articles.title: The Golden Globes Gave Us a Show After All - Vulture
articles.description: The zombie-Globes still managed to maintain an essential Globes-iness: the sense that everything was five seconds from going completely off the rails.
articles.content:
Credit to the Golden Globes: Even when theyre canceled, they still know how to put on a show.
